name: Stocking Stuffers
description: In Stocking Stuffers, you play as Stuffy the elf, working inside a stocking stuffer factory at the north pole. Stuff Stockings and keep Rudy, your reindeer coworker, from ruining your hard work. This game was made for Glitch City's 2013 Holiday Game Jam. I designed and did the art, and Salty programmed the game.
